description.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Noah! I grew up in the Da Lat - Lam Dong, Viet Nam, currently working in Ho Chi Minh city, and I love all things that are creative. From the misty forests to the vibrant city streets, my surroundings have always fueled my passion for design and coding.
description.paragraph2: As a self-taught engineer, I found my calling in blending artistic flair with technical skill. My journey has led me to specialize in fullstack development, where I craft interactive experiences that are not just functional, but also visually stunning.
description.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me enjoying digital arts, and cinema masterpieces or even participating content creating activities, such as cosplaying.
description.paragraph4: Join me as we continue to push the web towards a future where everything moves at the speed of light!

job_group_1.title: Freelance Engineer
job_group_1.description: I love experimenting with web technologies, especially JavaScript. These new techstacks have helped speed up and optimize the products that my clients have asked for, and even satisfied. And most of my products are made public on Github.

job_group_2.title: PC Technician
job_group_2.description: Aside from software development, I also love to tinker with computer hardware. I worked for a small computer workshop in Da Lat, and regularly repaired, upgraded and built desktop/laptop systems for customers at home.

school_group_1.title: Bachelors Of Computer Networking / Data Communications
school_group_1.description: This is a prestigious school branch of the Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City. I chose UIT as my destination because the study program has satisfied my passion / technique for the web world.
